title: Rhine boatmen
brief_description: An account of the lives of the 40,000 men and women who live on the boats that trade up and down the Rhine, with some description of the river and its history.
description: An account of the lives of the 40,000 men and women who live on the boats that trade up and down the Rhine, with some description of the river and its history.
